options.name: Defense Against Darkness
options.description: You Learn 2 Beginner and 2 Novice Abjuration Spell

options.name: Seeker of Zealots
options.description: Gain +2 Dark Mitigation and +2 Divine Mitigation

options.name: Action : Condemn
options.description: You declare an Attack against a Creature, and then make that Attack with a +2 Bonus as part of the same Action. If you deal Damage to the Creature, you gain a 1d4 Bonus on your next Attack or Defense Check before the start of your next turn. If you miss, the Creature has a 1d4 Bonus to the next Attack or Defense Check it makes against you.

options.name: Holy Sight
options.description: You become Immune to the Blinded Condition and gain +1 Resistance

options.name: Free Action : Trial By Fire
options.description: If a Creature has dealt Dark Damage, is a Dark Creature or has Channeled a Necromancy, Fiend or Witchcraft Spell within the past minute, you can force a Contested Insight Check against their Persuasion. On a success, the Target takes Fire Damage equal to the total value of your Insight Check. This ability can be used without the prerequisites when you True Hit any Creature with an Action.
